#summary select(objectName, property, options [includeBlank, multiple, valueField, textField, label, wrapLabel, prepend, append, prependToLabel, appendToLabel, errorElement])
#labels api,1.0

*Category*:

[ViewHelperFunctions View Helper Functions]

*Description*

Builds and returns a string containing a checkbox form control based on the supplied property and objectName. Wheels will generate the appropriate name convention for the form control.

*Return Type*:

String

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:

||   || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *objectName* || string || true ||  || The name of the object (model name) to wrap the property around ||
|| * property* || string || true || || The name of the property (database column) to use in the form control ||
|| * options* || query || true || || The name of the collection to populate the select form control ||
|| * includeBlank* || boolean || false || false || Whenever or not to include a blank option in the select form control ||
|| * multiple* || boolean || false || false || Whenever or not to allow multiple selection of options in the select form control ||
|| * multiple* || boolean || false || false || Whenever or not to allow multiple selection of options in the select form control ||
|| * valueField* || any || false || id || Query column to use for the value of each list element. Used with the `options` attribute. ||
|| * textField* || any || false || name || Query column to use for the value of each list element that the end user will see. Used with the `options` attribute.||
|| * label* || string || false || || The label to prepend to the form control ||
|| * wrapLabel* || boolean || false || true || Sets whenever to wrap or not the form control inside the label HTML tag ||
|| * prepend* || string || false || || Value to prepend to the form control. Useful to wrap the control around HTML tags ||
|| * append* || string || false || || Value to append to the form control. Useful to wrap the control around HTML tags ||
|| * prependToLabel* || string || false || || Value to prepend to the form control's label. Useful to wrap the control around HTML tags ||
|| * appendToLabel* || string || false || || Value to append to the form control's label. Useful to wrap the control around HTML tags ||
|| * errorElement* || string || false || div || Name of the HTML tag to wrap the form control when the [ObjectValidation object validation] fails ||


*Examples*:

{{{
<!--- controller code --->
<cfset authors = model("Author").findAll()>

<!--- view code --->
<cfoutput>
  <p>#select(objectName="book", property="authorid", options=authors)#</p>
</cfoutput>
}}}
